SEO.TITLE: Lucas Nunes | Product Engineer | Scalable Solutions Specialist
SEO.DESCRIPTION: Software Engineer focused on transforming business challenges into robust digital solutions. Expert in React, Angular, Node.js and Cloud Infrastructure.
SEO.KEYWORDS: Product Engineer, Software Architect, Angular Specialist, Scalable Systems, Lucas Nunes, Senior Web Developer

HEADER.NAME: Lucas Meireles
HEADER.ROLE: Product Engineer | Scalable Solutions (React • Angular • Node)

HERO.DESCRIPTION: I am a Software Engineer focused on transforming business challenges into robust digital solutions. With solid experience in national payment management for the CNJ and financial ecosystems at Randon, I leverage the TypeScript ecosystem to deliver scalable products. Currently, I focus on clean architecture concepts, high performance, and building SaaS products that drive real value.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects and Contributions
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Check out some of my most recent work

RANDON.TITLE: Financing & CDC Ecosystem
RANDON.DESC: Credit and backoffice solutions for fleet financing and Randon products.
RANDON.DEEP_DIVE:
I worked as a Software Engineer in the vehicle fleet financing ecosystem, developing scalable credit solutions and backoffices. We used Next.js and NestJS following the BFF architecture pattern, ensuring efficient and secure communication between the frontend and financial services.

On the frontend, we prioritized data integrity and user experience, utilizing React Hook Form and Zod for complex and secure validations in high-criticality forms.

Following Clean Architecture principles, we ensured code quality with Jest unit tests and a modern Docker infrastructure. I actively collaborated with the security team to mitigate vulnerabilities, ensuring the final product was not only high-performing but fully compliant with banking standards.

CNJ_PJE.TITLE: PJe: Procedural Search Modernization
CNJ_PJE.DESC: Refactoring and performance optimization for Brazil's largest judicial system.
CNJ_PJE.DEEP_DIVE:
I led the modernization of critical PJe modules, focusing on transitioning legacy components to a contemporary Angular architecture. The main challenge was optimizing the procedural search engine, where I used Signals for granular reactivity and RxJS to manage complex asynchronous flows, drastically reducing API response times.

We implemented significant accessibility and performance improvements monitored via Lighthouse, ensuring a fluid interface with Angular Material. The project required strict control over component lifecycles and the application of Clean Code principles to ensure the maintainability of an ecosystem serving millions of daily users.

BARBER.TITLE: Smart Barber Manager
BARBER.DESC: Mobile SaaS ecosystem focused on scheduling automation and revenue management.
BARBER.DEEP_DIVE:
Developed with a SaaS model focus, this project exemplifies the creation of a profitable MVP in a short timeframe, balancing operational costs and performance. I used React Native (Expo) and Node.js to deliver a robust solution, grounded in rigorous technical documentation that serves as the product's blueprint.

Beyond engineering, the project serves as the foundation for a knowledge-sharing initiative, where I document the journey of building a profitable app — from Figma prototyping and Jira backlog management to launch — providing a practical look at transforming code into a real business asset.

LAB.TITLE: Portfolio & Engineering Lab
LAB.DESC: My R&D core focused on Clean Architecture, real-world experience, and software quality.
LAB.DEEP_DIVE:
This lab is my creative space, where technical documentation is born from the real need for well-structured software. Built with Angular and focused on Clean Architecture, it's where I share my daily engineering journey, turning complex experiments into practical content for the community.

I treat every update with rigor, using Versioning and Release cycles, yet always prioritizing the human experience: in upcoming versions, I'll integrate the Spotify Web SDK so users can feel the same 'flow' and tranquility I seek when coding. It's the place where I prove that quality, tested, and documented code is what enables global scale, but the focus on daily life and people is what makes software truly real.

CNJ_RPV.TITLE: Court-Ordered Payments Management (Sispreq)
CNJ_RPV.DESC: National architecture for unification and transparency of federal judicial payments.
CNJ_RPV.DEEP_DIVE:
I worked on the development of Sispreq, a key project within the Justice 4.0 Program, aimed at modernizing Brazil's judicial payment workflows. Using Angular 17+ with a reactive architecture based on Signals and RxJS, we ensured precise state management to handle sensitive financial data.

On the backend, we leveraged Java with Spring Boot to support complex business rules and secure integrations. The project followed Clean Architecture principles, ensuring the system remains sustainable and scalable for federal courts nationwide. My role spanned from initial technical mapping to delivering high-performance modules, always focusing on data integrity and regulatory compliance.

THINK_DIFFERENT.DESCRIPTION: I don't just create digital experiences — I design journeys that connect people to solutions. My approach merges aesthetics, functionality, and a human touch to turn the complex into something intuitive and enjoyable to use.
